svg.title: ICE-01: Multi-Project Context Orchestration Dashboard
svg.desc: Advanced dashboard visualizing context management across multiple simultaneous projects, showing context inheritance, shared knowledge utilization, and cross-project learning patterns.
svg.text: Real-Time Cross-Project Context Management • Knowledge Sharing • Learning Analytics

g.text: 6 Active Projects • Real-Time Status • Context Health Monitoring
Sarah updated context templates - AI Platform
DevOps context shared to Analytics team
